plot: Kei and Yuri are back in action as they Head off to a Prison asteroid to rescue the Warden and stop the riot. Later admist the chaos of Halloween they Have to stop a runaway Battle Android before it goes into battle mode.
opening_theme: "By Yourself" by Keiko Mai / Tsuneiku Waizumi
ending_theme: "Summer Time From Autumn" by Keiko Mai / Akiya Nakazaki
